mapper.select: select p.id, p.title, u.username, p.createDate from post p inner join user u on p.userId = u.id order by p.id desc
mapper.insert: insert into post (title, content, userId, createDate) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, now());
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: select c.id, u.username, c.content, c.userId from comment c inner join user u on c.userId = u.id where c.postId = #{id} order by c.id desc
